name: Netón Vega
description: '''Luis Ernesto Vega Carvajal''', known professionally as '''Netón Vega''', is a Mexican singer-songwriter from [[La Paz, Baja California Sur]]. He is known for his songwriting on "Rubicon" and "[[La People]]", taken from [[Peso Pluma]]'s album ''[[Génesis (Peso Pluma album)|Génesis]]'' (2023), and for collaborating with [[Luis R. Conriquez]] on the 2024 single "[[Si No Quieres No]]", which appeared on the US [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]].
